languages.text: Маршал Адептус Арбитес ждет Вольного Торговца на Даргонусе. У него есть какое-то дело к династии фон Валанциус. Чтобы начать аудиенцию, Лорд-капитану надо поговорить с Соломоном в тронной зале во дворце Даргонуса.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.
languages.original_text: Маршал Адептус Арбитес ждет Вольного Торговца на Даргонусе. У него есть какое-то дело к династии фон Валанциус. Чтобы начать аудиенцию, Лорд-капитану надо поговорить с Соломоном в тронной зале во дворце Даргонуса.

traits.locale_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

languages.text: 高等裁定局の将帥が、ダルゴナスでローグトレーダーを待っている。彼はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と何らかの関係があるようだ。謁見を開始するには、ロード・キャプテンがダルゴナスの宮殿にある玉座の間でソロモーンと話す必要がある。
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局の将帥が、ダルゴナスでローグトレーダーを待っている。彼はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝と何らかの関係があるようだ。謁見を開始するには、ロード・キャプテンがダルゴナスの宮殿にある玉座の間でソロモーンと話す必要がある。

languages.text: Der Marschall des Adeptus Arbites wartet auf Dargonus auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Er hat offenbar etwas mit der Dynastie von Valancius zu besprechen. Um die Audienz zu beginnen, sollte der Lord Captain im Thronsaal des Palastes von Dargonus mit Solomorne sprechen.
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: Der Marschall des Adeptus Arbites wartet auf Dargonus auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Er hat offenbar etwas mit der Dynastie von Valancius zu besprechen. Um die Audienz zu beginnen, sollte der Lord Captain im Thronsaal des Palastes von Dargonus mit Solomorne sprechen.

languages.text: Le maréchal de l'Adeptus Arbites, qui semble vouloir traiter avec la dynastie von Valancius, attend {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur Dargonus. Pour lui accorder une audience, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit parler à Solomorne dans la salle du trône au palais de Dargonus.
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: Le maréchal de l'Adeptus Arbites, qui semble vouloir traiter avec la dynastie von Valancius, attend {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} sur Dargonus. Pour lui accorder une audience, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit parler à Solomorne dans la salle du trône au palais de Dargonus.

languages.text: El mariscal del Adeptus Arbites espera {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente en Dargonus. Por lo visto tiene un asunto pendiente con la dinastía von Valancius. Para comenzar la audiencia, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe hablar con Solomorne en la sala del trono de su palacio en Dargonus.
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: El mariscal del Adeptus Arbites espera {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente en Dargonus. Por lo visto tiene un asunto pendiente con la dinastía von Valancius. Para comenzar la audiencia, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe hablar con Solomorne en la sala del trono de su palacio en Dargonus.

languages.text: 帝国法务部的元帅正在达戈努斯等候行商浪人，此人似乎与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间有所往来。在正式接见帝国法务部代表前，行商浪人应当前往达戈努斯宫殿中的王座大厅，与索罗蒙谈谈。
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: 帝国法务部的元帅正在达戈努斯等候行商浪人，此人似乎与冯·瓦兰修斯王朝之间有所往来。在正式接见帝国法务部代表前，行商浪人应当前往达戈努斯宫殿中的王座大厅，与索罗蒙谈谈。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites Miralayı, Dargonus'ta Hür Tacir'i bekliyor. Görünüşe göre von Valancius hanedalığıyla görülecek bir işi var. Görüşmeyi başlatmak için Lord Kaptan'ın Dargonus'taki sarayın taht odasında Solomorne'la konuşması gerek.
languages.original_text: The Marshal of the Adeptus Arbites is waiting for the Rogue Trader on Dargonus. It seems he has business with the von Valancius dynasty. To commence the audience, the Lord Captain should speak to Solomorne in the throne room at the palace on Dargonus.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites Miralayı, Dargonus'ta Hür Tacir'i bekliyor. Görünüşe göre von Valancius hanedalığıyla görülecek bir işi var. Görüşmeyi başlatmak için Lord Kaptan'ın Dargonus'taki sarayın taht odasında Solomorne'la konuşması gerek.
